text: Caroline Rose Hunt (January 8, 1923 - November 13, 2018) was an American heiress, hotelier and philanthropist. == Biography == At one time the wealthiest woman in the United States.Cheryl Hall. "Once considered America's richest woman, Caroline Hunt offers a rare look at her famous Dallas family," The Dallas Morning News, November 3, 2017. She was known for being the founder of Rosewood Hotels & Resorts, which she founded in 1979. She was born in El Dorado, Arkansas.Cotten Timberlake. "A little thriftiness, lots of luxury - Caroline Hunt puts father's lessons to work at her hotels," Houston Chronicle, June 7, 1992, Business section, page 8. Hunt died at her mansion near Dallas on November 13, 2018 from a stroke at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1923 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:Philanthropists from Texas Category:Writers from Arkansas Category:Businesspeople from Texas Category:Writers from Dallas Category:People from El Dorado, Arkansas
title: Caroline Rose Hunt
